title: Metallica Collection(Complete Discography plus various stuff)
description:
a decent sized Collection of Metallica.

Includes - Entire discography to St.Anger at 320kbps

So that would be;
(1983) Kill &#039;Em All (117MB)
(1984) Ride The Lightning (108MB)
(1986) Master of Puppets (125MB)
(1988) ...And Justice for All (150MB)
(1991) Metallica (143MB) 
(1996) Load (180MB)
(1997) Reload (174MB)
(1998) Garage, Inc (312MB, CD1 150Mb, CD2 162MB)
(1999) S&M with the San Francisco Symphony (305MB total, CD1 153MB, CD2 151MB)
(2003) St. Anger (172MB)

As well as a bunch of live shows at various bitrates

Various stuff includes:

1982 Garage Demo with Ron Mcgovney

No life till leather demo(with dave mustaine)

Metallica Demo Pack

Sad but true single

Ramones Covers

St Anger, DVD audio

Metallica for fans only (Until the studio shit load)

also has I disappear, 
We did it again
(Riff metallica gave to Swizz beats, featuring ja rule rapping over it)

Also has the apocalyptica covers though I don&#039;t think it&#039;s complete
